item1: Description Business Company produces products used primarily aerospace (commercial defense), commercial transportation, industrial other markets. Howmet seeks provide its customers innovative solutions through offering differentiated products such airfoils advanced cooling coatings extreme temperature applications; specially-designed fasteners lightweight composite airframe construction, reduced assembly costs, lightning strike protection; lightweight aluminum commercial wheels. Its products solutions include investment castings jet engines industrial gas turbines (nickel superalloys, titanium, aluminum), including airfoils structural parts; seamless rolled rings jet engines (mostly nickel superalloys); fastening systems aerospace, industrial commercial transportation applications (titanium, steel, nickel superalloys); forged jet engine components (e.g., jet engine disks); machined forged aircraft parts (titanium aluminum); forged aluminum commercial vehicle wheels, all which sold directly customers through distributors.
